name: Jackfruit Pulled Pork Sandwiches
description: These jackfruit pulled pork sandwiches with avocado and ranch sauce don't only look like the real thing, but they also taste amazing!!
recipeIngredient: 2 20 oz cans young green jackfruit in brine or water

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and rinse the jackfruit. Remove the core and put in a mixing bowl. Stir in the spices (paprika, cumin, brown sugar) so the pieces are nicely covered.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain and rinse the jackfruit. Remove the core and put in a mixing bowl. Stir in the spices (paprika, cumin, brown sugar) so the pieces are nicely covered.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Sauté the onion for about 3 minutes or until it becomes translucent. Then add the garlic and cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Sauté the onion for about 3 minutes or until it becomes translucent. Then add the garlic and cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the jackfruit and cook for about 3 minutes. Then add the BBQ sauce, the liquid smoke (if using),  and the vegetable broth and cook for another 15- 20 minutes. Use a fork to shred the jackfruit.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the jackfruit and cook for about 3 minutes. Then add the BBQ sauce, the liquid smoke (if using),  and the vegetable broth and cook for another 15- 20 minutes. Use a fork to shred the jackfruit.

recipeInstructions.text: In then meantime make the vegan ranch sauce: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: In then meantime make the vegan ranch sauce: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the pulled jackfruit on a bun together with tomatoes, lettuce, avocado, and ranch sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve the pulled jackfruit on a bun together with tomatoes, lettuce, avocado, and ranch sauce.
